device-name.name: Video Device
device-name.description: Camera that is used for capturing the video

quality-multiplier.name: Video Quality
quality-multiplier.description: If you have a high-resolution camera and video lags, try to decrease this value

video-output-enable.name: Enable
video-output-enable.description: Translate the video to the background of the level

video-output-fps-limit.name: FPS Limit
video-output-fps-limit.description: Maximum refresh rate of the video

video-output-layer.name: Layer
video-output-layer.description: Layer above which the video is shown

pose-estimation-enable.name: Enable
pose-estimation-enable.description: Enable pose estimation and game control with the pose

pose-estimation-num-of-threads.name: Number Of Threads
pose-estimation-num-of-threads.description: Pose estimation is a complex task uses the neural network and requires many computational resources. That is why it is executed in parallel in several threads. <cg>The more threads it uses the faster it works</c>

pose-estimation-video-output-fps-limit.name: FPS Limit
pose-estimation-video-output-fps-limit.description: Maximum refresh rate of the pose estimation

pose-estimation-use-gpu.name: Use GPU (only NVIDIA supported)
pose-estimation-use-gpu.description:
Use GPU to speed up the neural network computations. 
 <co>Don't enable if you don't have an NVIDIA GPU</c>
<cg>But if you have it, I highly recommend enabling this option!</c>

pose-estimation-debug-draw.name: Show the pose
pose-estimation-debug-draw.description:
Show estimated pose when playing a level. 
 <cb>I promise to make it less ugly in the future</c>

green-screen-color.name: Green Screen Color
green-screen-color.description: Color that will be replaced. Online color picker: https://imagecolorpicker.com/
